#!/usr/bin/env sh
# Gradle wrapper script (compatible with Gradle 7.x)
# DO NOT EDIT THIS FILE UNLESS YOU KNOW WHAT YOU'RE DOING.
if [ -z "$WRAPPER_HOME" ]; then
  WRAPPER_HOME=$(cd "$(dirname "$0")" && pwd)
fi
CLASSPATH="$WRAPPER_HOME/gradle/wrapper/gradle-wrapper.jar"
if [ ! -f "$CLASSPATH" ]; then
  echo "Gradle wrapper JAR not found: $CLASSPATH"
  echo "You can generate wrapper files by running 'gradle wrapper' in this directory (requires Gradle installed),"
  echo "or download gradle-wrapper.jar into android/gradle/wrapper/."
  exit 1
fi
# Use java from JAVA_HOME if available
if [ -n "$JAVA_HOME" ] && [ -x "$JAVA_HOME/bin/java" ]; then
  JAVACMD="$JAVA_HOME/bin/java"
else
  JAVACMD=java
fi
# Default JVM options
DEFAULT_JVM_OPTS="-Xmx1024m"
# exec
exec "$JAVACMD" $DEFAULT_JVM_OPTS -classpath "$CLASSPATH" org.gradle.wrapper.GradleWrapperMain "$@"
